ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] RE: Test Problem fixed
ygData.msgSnippet: I sincerely hope the one lesson we learn form all this is to outlaw punch ballots everywhere.  Not that digital balloting is error free, but at least there can
ygData.messageBody:
I sincerely hope the one lesson we learn form all this is to outlaw punch
ballots everywhere. Not that digital balloting is error free, but at least
there can be no subjective determination of the voter's intent to muddy the
waters.

-----Original Message-----
From: Jeffrey Sue [mailto:jsue@...]
Sent: Monday, November 13, 2000 11:24 AM
To: eqbards@egroups.com; eqbards@egroups.com
Subject: RE: [eqbards] RE: Test Problem fixed



>
>That ballot in Palm Beach Florida was very poorly designed. I guess that
>guy can always get a job working for Verant...
>
>Slyde

so the democrats can't even design a ballot right, and we want one as
president???

:P
